entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
